```{r setup, echo = FALSE}
library(readr)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r read data}
crime <- read_csv(here::here("data/Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.csv"))
```
```{r select time period}
time <- c("2010":"2019")
```

# Section 3 Yuheng Cui
```{r clean data}
crime_c <- crime %>%
  filter(Year %in% time)%>%
  group_by(Year, `Offence Division`) %>%
  rename(Rate = `Rate per 100,000 population`)
```


```{r }
crime_c %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Year,
            y = Rate,
            group = `Offence Division`,
            )) +
  geom_col(aes(color = `Offence Division`), fill = "white")
```

```{r other offences}
crime_E <- crime_c %>%
  filter(`Offence Division` == "E Justice procedures offences")
```

```{r}
crime_E %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Year,
             y = Rate)) +
  geom_col()
```
